title: David Lammy – 2020 Speech on Sentencing Law Changes
author: admin
summary: The comments made by David Lammy, the Shadow Justice Secretary, on 16 September 2020.
content:
It is totally hypocritical for Boris Johnson to play tough on law and order in the same week that he ordered his MPs to vote to break the law.
